string-array.name: updates
string-array.item: v0.6.6: Fixed no articles beeing fetched with getArticles and problem with VirtualCategories
v0.6.5: Fixed problem with attached images, Changed update-behaviour
v0.6.4: Fix for concurrent DB-Access, SDCard not used anymore, smaller memory-footprint, added Changelog
v0.6.3: Refactored a lot, fixed some synchronisation issues, better Fling-Recognition
v0.6.2: Added the license to all files, added Update-Check
v0.6.1: Passwords can contain special characters, Download of attached Audio/Video files)
v0.6: Better check for connectivity, show attached videos and play music
